name: Kite Boy: Ride the Wind
description:
Kite boy is after the eight mystical idols of the mountains. Use the left and right arrow keys to control the wind. Hit R to reset the level.

Code, art, sound, and design done by two people in under 48 hours for GMTK 2021. 

Download the game for Windows for fullscreen and clearer audio here.

Thank you to Maujoe for their simple wind shader.
